column4: okay well to be honest I've already tried setting up the wireless card and it exists in my interfaces file, but iwconfig won't work on it
iwconfig up wlan0 returns " Error: unrecognized wireless request"
ifconfig up wlan0 returns "wlan0: Unknown host"
it returns info on the file and the loopback device and my lan connection (eth0)
Okay, then your wireless device isn't listed, right?
Okay, go to Computer -> System Configuration -> Networking
either your a genius or I'm a complete idiot
Your wireless device should show up in the interfaces file now.
sudo ifup wlan0 should also work now.  Of course, you can also try it from the GUI dialog you were just in, but that doesn't always work for me.
